text: Uye (rangarirai) Dhun-Noon (Yunus (Jonah)) apo paakabva achienda akatsamwa (munzvimbo iyo yaaiva atumirwa), uye akafunga kuti hatimubati! Akava anochema ari murima hombe (achiti): “Laa ilaaha illaa Anta (Hakuna umwe mwari anokodzera kunamatwa kunze kwenyu (Allah))! Kukudzwa ngakuve kwamuri! Zvirokwazvo ndini mutadzi.”
